root: ^After you finish preparing your meal, you sit down to eat it.

c-1: ^ You look through the recommendations of videos on your account.

Netflix: ^You wonder why you keep paying for this when you feel like you can never find something satisfying to watch.
^You know your kids have been raving about it forever, maybe now is the time to catch up.
YouTube: ^Lots of video games and home project tutorials.
^You look up music videos from your youth to reminisce a little.
Evening: ^You watch for most of the afternoon.
^You haven't taken time for yourself in a really long time.
^You know there are chores to get done.
^If you don't do them, no one will.
^But when was the last time you really did something for yourself?
^You realize you should be starting dinner soon.

c-1: ^ There is plenty of leftover spaghetti...

SomethingNew: ^but you recall when your kids ran out of the house after making those special omelettes this morning.
^They're going to a friend's birthday party tonight anyway.
SpaghettiAgain: ^You have a lot of leftover spaghetti.
^Tons, really, since your husband didn't eat any of it last night.
^But do you really want leftover spaghetti?
Pizza: ^You think back on all the work you've done around the house.
^Your kids running out without even a glance at breakfast.
^Your kids are going to miss dinner anyway.
^You call up your favorite pizza place.
^You order yourself a pizza with a side of breadsticks.
^And enjoy the rest of your night.
^Someone has to take care of the person who does everything around here.
